result.longName: TUS ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT Co., LTD.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: TUS ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT Co., LTD. is involved in the sewage treatment, water, solid waste treatment, and other businesses in the People's Republic of China. It also engages in renewable resource processing; municipal construction and environmental protection equipment installation and technical consulting; and sanitation businesses. In addition, the company is involved in the provision of sanitation services; sludge treatment and disposal; environmental technology research and development; biomass power generation; provision of financing services; municipal and waste vegetable disposal; and medical waste treatment, as well as landfill business, construction and investment in thermal and production projects; environmental protection business, such as water pollution control; and zero carbon business; manufacture of environmental protection equipment; food waste treatment and investment in renewable resources; financial leasing business; and real estate development and sales, housing leasing, and property management business. Further, it engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of sanitation vehicles. The company was formerly known as Tus-Sound Environmental Resources Co., Ltd. TUS ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT Co., LTD. was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.
